name: S3 Encryption Policy
description: Ensures all S3 buckets have default server-side encryption enabled using AES-256 or AWS KMS.
requirements: All S3 buckets must enforce default encryption
Bucket policy must deny unencrypted uploads

controls.title: Enable Default Encryption
controls.text: Ensure default S3 encryption is enabled using AES-256 or KMS.

controls.title: Deny Unencrypted Uploads
controls.text: Bucket policy must deny any PUT operation without SSE headers.

controls.title: Block Public Access
controls.text: Ensure bucket-level Block Public Access settings are enabled.
